title: 【新人第二次发帖】指令方块核导弹 二号！多弹头重返大气层载具
author: sunjichen
txt_content:
本帖最后由 sunjichen 于 2015-1-30 15:31 编辑 

哈哈 这是我第二次发帖了 因为没什么灵感 所以做了个核弹二号多弹头重返大气层载具 感觉屌屌哒 
一号核弹链接： http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-398826-1-1.html
这次更有逼格！{:10_505:}
导弹升空！






炸了！妈妈再也不用担心我挖不到矿！






第二发对比图





发射前







发射后










就叫他基友房子终结者【手动斜眼】

威力真?恐怖

好吧 发命令 
summon Creeper ~1 ~1 ~ 
{Riding:{id:Creeper,ExplosionRadius:127,CustomName:"Nuke",CustomNameVisible:1,ignited:1,Fuse:280,Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:10000}],Riding:{id:Creeper,ExplosionRadius:127,CustomName:"Nuke",CustomNameVisible:1,ignited:1,Fuse:260,Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:10000}],Riding:{id:PrimedTnt,Fuse:50,Riding:{id:Creeper,ExplosionRadius:127,CustomName:"Nuke",CustomNameVisible:1,ignited:1,Fuse:240,Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:10000}],Riding:{id:Creeper,ExplosionRadius:127,CustomName:"Nuke",CustomNameVisible:1,ignited:1,Fuse:220,Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:10000}],Riding:{id:Creeper,ExplosionRadius:127,CustomName:"Nuke",CustomNameVisible:1,ignited:1,Fuse:200,Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:10000}],Riding:{id:PrimedTnt,Fuse:50,Riding:{id:Creeper,ExplosionRadius:127,CustomName:"Nuke",CustomNameVisible:1,ignited:1,Fuse:180,Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:10000}],Riding:{id:Creeper,ExplosionRadius:127,CustomName:"Nuke",CustomNameVisible:1,ignited:1,Fuse:160,Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:10000}],Riding:{id:Creeper,ExplosionRadius:127,CustomName:"Nuke",CustomNameVisible:1,ignited:1,Fuse:140,Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:10000}],Riding:{id:Creeper,ExplosionRadius:127,CustomName:"Nuke",CustomNameVisible:1,ignited:1,Fuse:120,Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:10000}],Riding:{id:Creeper,Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:10000}],Fuse:150,ignited:1,ExplosionRadius:127,Riding:{id:PrimedTnt,Fuse:50,Riding:{id:Creeper,ExplosionRadius:127,CustomName:"Nuke",CustomNameVisible:1,ignited:1,Fuse:100,Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:10000}],Riding:{id:FireworksRocketEntity,LifeTime:50,FireworksItem:{id:401,Count:1,tag:{Fireworks:
{Explosions:[{Flicker:8,Trail:1,Type:4,Colors:[16716055,255,3026478],FadeColors:[8405056,1986319,16729674]},
{Flicker:8,Trail:1,Type:2,Colors:[0,6836616,8687951],FadeColors:[65344,1671168,16776960]},
{Flicker:8,Trail:0,Type:3,Colors:[16711680,0],FadeColors:[6955159,4247567,65280]},
{Flicker:8,Trail:1,Type:0,Colors:[4227200,0],FadeColors:[16744703,16711680,65280]},
{Flicker:20,Trail:0,Type:1,Colors:[7403598,16578646,255],FadeColors:[16777215,65280,16711680]}]}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}


大家可以看到，其实这个就是在1代基础上上面叠了十几个苦力怕（爆炸威力调到最大）和TNT（用于炸散苦力怕以增加威力）
自己玩吧 楼主写作业去了{:10_522:}








经过楼主测试 穿上PM大大的全套保护24464级钻石套啃附魔金苹果 然后还是被我的核弹炸死了 秒杀啊我去{:10_499:}
